description:
## Features

### Event Title:
Shows the name of the event subgroup and brief details (course name, distance and elevation) of any event in which the current watched athlete is participating

### Top Bar:
A replacement for the default Zwift speed / distance / elevation / time bar that appears on the centre top of the Zwift window, with a more Sauce like look

### Power Cadence HR:
A replacement for the default Zwift Power, Cadence and HR box normally in the top left of the screen, can also show draft

### Power Bars:
A bar chart display of the current and best 1 s, 5 s, 15 s, 60 s, 5 min, 20 min and average power for the current user session. Can also optionally show heart rate

### Power Graph:
A graph of the current and best power as a function of time for the currently watched athlete - a continuously updated and evolving power curve

### Input:
Shows parameters that reflect the rider's input to the Zwift system (power, cadence and heart rate) as well as draft and gradient

### Output:
Show parameters which are the output of the Zwift session: speed, distance, time, elevation, as well as distance or time remaining in an event

### Active Power Up:
Shows the power up (Aero / Feather / Draft / Burrito etc) currently in use by the watched rider. Unfortunately there is no way to show the power up being held and available for the rider to use with information available to Sauce from Zwift.

description:
O101 racing mods, made by Onno Aphinan. These mod windows can help you to race better, improve your race craft.

**Nearby Race v2**
Shows position, category, team badge, active power up, gap, speed, draft, hr, power with color. Marked riders, robopacers, also show them sticky or only. TTT options and FRR mode.

**Groups Race**
Shows gap to you, group size, power with color, visual speed indicator, max position. Also some filtering possible to give you the best overview. Horizontal and vertical mode.

**Ladder Race**
It is nearby and groups combined. It also shows actual points, pre-race stats and finish information. Auto and manual configuration, gets data from ladder site.

**Overview**
Shows route/race/event information. Static and actual race information like power ups, distance, time,elevation, progress, lap info. Route segments overview, actual segment information with ETA. A Zwift like leaderboard.

**Livedata**
Shows actual information like speed, power, draft, virtal power, cadence, hr, gradient, gears. Power in Watts or Wkg.

**Progress Bar**
With percentage, name, distance, finish, lap name options.

**Fan Viewer**
A bit of a fan view companion app. Easily navigate the riders in a race. Jump to leader/lantern rouge, fist/last of group and change camera. Also easily switch to marked riders. A map with profile as background.

For more detailed info, check https://github.com/Opperhoofd/o101_s4z_mods?tab=readme-ov-file#O101-racing-MODS

description:
## DosenHuhn Mod Collection
### wprime and cp update

This window will fetch the wprime and cp data for either 
- teamid of all registered club riders from zwiftracing.app (zwiftracing api key required)
- from intervals.icu
- local json file with following structure:

### groups
The groups mod shows the team badge from the watched rider and teammates left of the bubbles. In zoomed view the metrics shown are configurable up to 2 values per line. Wbal included.

### nearby
The nearby mod added in settings the option to show teammates only.
  
### averages
This windows shows the some collected average values like power and hr.

### states
Shows actual state values like gradient, pwr, hr, speed and wbal. The pwr field swaps to w/kg at a gradient > 3.5
  
### powerdist
Only a horizontal stacked bar chart showing the power distribution within the coggan zones (or selected zones)
  
### powercolor
A empty window just changing its backround color related to actual power zone
  
### gradient
This window shows the actual gradient. (The gradient is calculated if rider moved at least 5m)

### grid 
This window supports a grid view of multiple other sauce widgets. Browser only

description:
# TTT Power Dynamics

A mod to manage Team Time Trial rotations and track teammate performance.

### Features
* **Teammate Detection and Sorting:** Detects who your teammates are and sorts them by pull order (usually correctly).
* **Workload Tracking:** Monitors time spent pulling vs. sitting, including average wattage for each teammate.
* **Gap Status:** At-a-glance color coding shows if teammates are currently in the pack, ahead, or falling behind.

### Available Settings
* **Teammate Lock-in:** Adjust how many seconds it takes for a rider to be "confirmed" as a teammate.
* **Pull Detection Mode:** Choose between "First Position" (physical leader) or "Draft Mode" (detects anyone in the wind).
* **Minimum Pull Watts:** Set a wattage floor to ensure coasting at the front isn't counted as a pull.
* **User Position:** Force your own stats to the top or bottom of the list for easy reference.

### Usage
The mod automatically tracks all riders in your vicinity. Once a rider is "locked-in" as a teammate, their stats will persist even if they drop out of your immediate drafting range.
